curriculum.description: B.Tech Computer Science & Engineering program with industry-aligned curriculum, Choice Based Credit System (CBCS), and focus on Industry 4.0 requirements.

curriculum.description: B.Tech CSE with AI & ML specialization in collaboration with TCS, featuring industry-partnered curriculum and direct industry exposure.

curriculum.description: B.Tech CSE with Cyber Security specialization in collaboration with IBM, featuring industry-partnered curriculum and advanced cybersecurity training.
B.Tech CSE with Data Science specialization, covering big data analytics, Python & R programming, and industry-relevant projects.

curriculum.description: M.Tech Computer Science Engineering with Software Engineering specialization, focusing on advanced software development, system design, and software architecture.
B.Sc Information Technology 3-year program covering IT fundamentals, programming skills, system administration, and network management.
B.Sc Computer Science 3-year program covering computer science fundamentals, programming concepts, software development, and algorithm design.
M.Sc Information Technology program covering advanced IT concepts, research methodology, system design, and technology management.
BCA 3-year program focusing on programming fundamentals, software development, and IT career preparation.
Master of Computer Applications program covering advanced programming, software engineering, AI & Data Science, cloud computing, cybersecurity, and industry projects.
